response.original_title: Pip and Posy: Sandpit Friends + Zog
response.overview: Two half hour family films based on the much loved picture book written by Julia Donaldson and illustrated by Axel Scheffler. Pip and Posy are best friends whose lives revolve around a wonderful world of play. Packed with warmth and comedy, the series is a joyful celebration of their great friendship, its laughter and games, its ups and downs. In this summer - themed compilation, Pip and Posy play in thesandpit, make clay food, avoid imaginary crocodiles, watch falling stars and play with their friends.
response.title: Pip and Posy: Sandpit Friends + Zog
